Title: Titanic Failsafe
Description:
So, the titans sent their ancient machines against their disobedient children.

Would our creators have us protect the Coreway at the expense of all else? At the expense of Azeroth herself? Are we meant to preside over a road untraveled, leading to the world's dead heart?

No, today we are all Unbound, and we will fight for our freedom. For Azeroth!
PortraitGiverText: This ancient titan machine of war has risen from the depths of the ocean to eradicate the disobedient earthen of Dorn.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Report back to Alleria in Dornogal
RewardText: It was a trial by fire, but you've proven that the earthen of The Isle of Dorn are ready for the war to come. Where once there was discord, there is now unity of purpose. They are no longer Oathsworn or Unbound. They are united, just as we should be, against this darkness.
